thread.section_title: PhotonLight.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PhotonLight.com | www.photonlight.com
thread.title: Pastor Michael Shortsleeves
thread.title_full: PhotonLight.com reviewed by Pastor Michael Shortsleeves

author: Pastor Michael Shortsleeves
title: Pastor Michael Shortsleeves
text:
I only wanted a small light to help me lock up the church after evening service. It turns out I can see the whole parking lot with this little thing. Hoping the battery lasts. I was encouraged when I saw the little phillips screws on the back for replacing the battery.
Thanks for this.
